product_name: Icebreaker Tech V Lite T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Designed for everyday wear and trekking in the hills, the merino wool Icebreaker Tech V Lite T-Shirt can be worn solo in the summer or under another layer in cool weather. Made of soft merino wool, this shirt insulates, wicks away moisture and breathes-naturally. Superfine 150 weight wool is ideal for warm to hot weather; wear it solo in hot weather, or layer with another garment in cool temperatures. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Icebreaker Tech V Lite T-Shirt is machine washable; hang to dry.
short_description: Designed for everyday wear and trekking in the hills, the merino wool Icebreaker Tech V Lite T-Shirt can be worn solo in the summer or under another layer in cool weather.
